data.title: Bjelovar estate 1
data.meta_description: Discover your dream home at Bjelovar Estate 1, Croatia! This modern and spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a stunning…
data.text:
Description

Welcome to your new home at Bjelovar Estate 1, nestled in the charming and picturesque town of Bjelovar, Croatia. This exquisite apartment offers a perfect blend of modern living and serene surroundings, making it an ideal choice for those seeking comfort, convenience, and style.

Key Features:

Spacious Living Area: The open-plan living and dining area is designed for both relaxation and entertaining, with plenty of natural light streaming through large windows.

Modern Kitchen: The fully equipped kitchen boasts high-quality appliances, ample storage space, and a sleek design, perfect for cooking enthusiasts.

Bedrooms: The apartment features three generously sized bedrooms, each offering a peaceful retreat with built-in wardrobes and large windows.

Bathrooms: Two contemporary bathrooms are equipped with modern fixtures and fittings, providing a touch of luxury.

Balcony: Enjoy breathtaking views from the private balcony, a perfect spot for your morning coffee or evening relaxation.

Additional Amenities: The apartment includes central heating, air conditioning, and secure parking, ensuring year-round comfort and convenience.

Location:

Situated in the prestigious Bjelovar Estate 1, this apartment is part of a well-maintained and secure community. The estate offers a peaceful and family-friendly environment with beautifully landscaped gardens and recreational areas.

Proximity:

Local Amenities: Just a short walk away, you’ll find a variety of shops, restaurants, and cafes, catering to all your daily needs.

Transportation: Excellent public transport links provide easy access to the town center and surrounding areas, making commuting a breeze.

Schools and Healthcare: The estate is conveniently located near reputable schools and healthcare facilities, ensuring all essential services are within reach.

Why Choose This Apartment?

This apartment at Bjelovar Estate 1 is not just a place to live; it’s a lifestyle. Whether you’re a family looking for a spacious home, a professional seeking a comfortable base, or an investor searching for a valuable property, this apartment meets all your needs. Its blend of modern amenities, strategic location, and tranquil environment makes it a standout choice in the real estate market.

Don’t miss out on the opportunity to own this beautiful apartment. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and take the first step towards making Bjelovar Estate 1 your new home.
